name: Diamond Dan
description: Dragged into Archeology by his uncle, Dan decides to take matters into his own hands. He discovers ancient temples with long lost treasures and menacing traps. Dan follows the clues found in the temples which leads him on a trip across the world, bringing him ever closer to making a sensational discovery.

reviews.review_text: not a spelunky ripoff  actually a very robust and claustrophobic action-platformer

For a platform/puzzle game I give this a 8/10.  Animations 5/10, sort of slow.  Sounds 2/10.  Music 10/10 great theme. Was definately mae for this sort of game. Mario-ish, and yet sort of creepy like Pitfall 2.  Controller support, 0/10 You need Xpadder or Padstar.
